name: Kaideu Crommer
description: A curious and energetic dwarven child, often found underfoot in the forges or listening intently to Mattrim's songs.
ideals: Discovery: 'Everything has a why—and I wanna know it!'
Heritage: 'I’ll be just like Dad and Mum—only louder!'
Wonder: 'There’s magic in fire and song!'
bonds: His secret collection of broken horn parts
flaws: Has a habit of sneaking into restricted areas
backstory: Born into legacy and flame, Kaideu is raised on stories of Moradin and metal. Whether forging or performing, his destiny is bright.
motivations: To make something that wows his parents
To be allowed to play a real Horn of Moradin
knowledge: The names and quirks of every forgehand
Bits of dwarven songs, often sung off-key
speech_patterns: Speaks fast, often mid-thought. Mimics grown-up phrases he’s heard.
mannerisms: Tugs on beards, even if they’re not his. Tries to act like a grown dwarf but breaks into giggles.
gm_notes: Might sneak into trouble the players must help with, or surprise them with insight overheard from adults.
